data.text: Mano kaka unune malit un osimbo mar jomer man Efraim,
Ne, Ruoth Nyasaye nigi ngʼato man kod loch gi teko.
Osimbo ma jomer man Efraim sungorego
Berne malich norum mana ka maua maner,
E kindeno Jehova Nyasaye Maratego nobedi kaka
Enobed e chuny jangʼad bura mowinjore
To jogi bende kwangʼ
Mesa duto opongʼ gi ngʼok,
“En ngʼa motemo puonjo?
Onyisowa weche mak winjre ka mag jomomer ni:
To kata kamano Nyasaye biro wuoyo gi jogi
Mowachone niya,
Kuom mano, wach Jehova Nyasaye biro chalonegi mana ka wach awacha mar joma omer niya:
Kuom mano winjuru
Usungoru niya, “Wasetimo singruok gi tho
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho,
Abiro miyo adiera bedo tol mipimogo
Singruok maru gi tho nobed maonge;
E kinde duto ma masira nobi enotieku;
Kitanda nobed machiek ma ok nyal rieye tielo tir,
To Jehova Nyasaye biro aa malo mana
Koro weuru ajara mondo kik tol motweugo ridre,
Chik iti kendo iwinj dwonda,
Ka japur puro puodho mondo okom
Kosetieko loso puothe donge ochwoyo kothe mopogore opogore
Nyasache nyise yo monego oluw
Cham moko ok din gi twor to
Ngano nyaka regi mondo olos makati;
Magi duto bende oa kuom Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
